text: Travel to friendly Dawi hold. Engines buildings chain provides a chance to fully restore action points
Scout nearby province (select region in adjacent province). Support Radius buildings chain allows to reveal more.
Reinforce friendly Dawi army. Quality and quantity of drafted units depends on military buildings
Bombard enemy settlement. Damage scales with Crew Training buildings chain
Randomly (de)boost Malakai's army. Amount and Strength of effects depends on Beer Taps and Cargo Hold buildings chains. Might have some side effects on campaign and in battle.
Friendly Dawi Region in TSoG range
Friendly Dawi Army in TSoG Range
